title: A question for Riotgames.
body:
Dear Riotgames,

i know you wont answer to this question because its not 100% pointless like some other grabage joke-thread about graves cigar.

but my hopes are big this time.
and ill continue to open thread with the same question.

Player-X SAYS that he has shit internet for some reason.
hes is lagging and not playing. he is standing next to his tower doing nothing.....for like 16 min.
he gets exp because his tower gets pushed in.

the result is:
his team 4 players are getting tilted and toxic because hes doing absolutly NOTHING.
obviously trolling. talking about how he is recording the game, and is going to send the video with the toxic behaviour to riotgames

so WHY are his teammates getting punished for being toxic?
if this troll wasnt there in the first place they wouldnt be toxic....

replies.body: Because his team mates are immature little turds who also deserve to be punished. Feeding trolls is a punishable offense just like feeding bears in Yellowstone will get you in trouble if caught doing it.

>so WHY are his teammates getting punished for being toxic?
if this troll wasnt there in the first place they wouldnt be toxic....

While true, but you could say the same about any person being an asshole to another person,
"If this person wasn't here, I wouldn't have been an asshole to them!".

No. While some people are guilty of trolling, I don't see how a person trolling causes you to lose all responsibility for your actions.

super solution fight the the flame before it starts flaming.... fight the troll
but riot is not chasing for the troll.....actually they give a shit. because its work.

May I ask how you expect Riot to quickly and accurately detect trolls without accidentally punishing people who just play poorly un-intentionally?

Then once they are able to do that,

How do you expect Riot to punish these trolls before they actually troll?
Wow one sentence in and I already knew where this was going. Sorry buuuut *click*....Guess which one I pushed o-o
Faco can still post on the forums, but graves can't have a cigar. Rito plz.

Everybody gets trolls report them and move on already. If you fall low enough to trash talk the troll you are giving them a reaction which is exactly what they want. If they feel nobody actually cares then he is t going to risk feeding because he might later be banned. But if he is seeing people get mad and rage then he will laugh and enjoy feeding and ultimately keep doing it even if he ends up getting banned.

the fact that you made more than 7 threads about literally the same thing concerns me.

you writing an autobiography buddy?
trying to justify yourself?
mistook this for your diary?
no?

Then clearly you're no better than those so-called "toxic player" and "troller", perhaps worse.
no, iam complaining about the trash community, and riot does nothing aginst them...
